plot: Nicky has got a problem. He's got a problem with his love life, he's got a problem with his substance abuse, but most of all, he's got a problem with his roommate... Jimmy.
title: My Brother Cicero
plot_es: Nicky has got a problem. He's got a problem with his love life, he's got a problem with his substance abuse, but most of all, he's got a problem with his roommate... Jimmy.
plot_en: Nicky has got a problem. He's got a problem with his love life, he's got a problem with his substance abuse, but most of all, he's got a problem with his roommate... Jimmy.
